title: Hi! I'm Li Yuxuan
subtitle: 你好啊！我是李雨轩
body:
const{Fragment:e,jsx:n,jsxs:t}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(i){const o={a:"a",hr:"hr",p:"p",strong:"strong",...i.components},{WavingAvatar:a}=o;return a||function(e,n){throw new Error("Expected "+(n?"component":"object")+" `"+e+"` to be defined: you likely forgot to import, pass, or provide it.")}("WavingAvatar",!0),t(e,{children:[n("div",{className:"flex w-full items-center justify-center",children:n(a,{})}),"
",n(o.p,{children:"Hey there, I'm Li Yuxuan. I was born in Sichuan, growing up in Xiamen. I've been in Singapore, this sunny island since I was 15. And let me tell you, Singapore feels like a second home for me now."}),"
",t(o.p,{children:["By day, I'm diving deep into the world of ",n(o.strong,{children:"software engineering"}),", with a focus on ",n(o.strong,{children:"web development"}),". I'm currently working in ",n(o.a,{href:"https://mobbin.com",children:"Mobbin"})," as a Software Engineer, working on an internal tool that helps labelling and curation process. I often find myself get fascinated by the idea of creating beautiful and functional user experiences, and the learning journey of software engineering never stops and constantly excites me! Currently, apart from ",n(o.a,{href:"https://liyuxuan.dev",children:"this portfolio website"})," that I'm designing and developing now, I dedicate some of my time developing ",n(o.a,{href:"https://taboo-ai.vercel.app",children:"Taboo AI"}),". It is a gamified AI-powered web app that helps English learners to improve their vocabulary and expressions, with a constantly growing database of public contributed topics and words. My dream as a software engineer is to create a suite of educational tools that help learners to learn things in a fun and effective way! ",n(o.a,{href:"https://taboo-ai.vercel.app",children:"Taboo AI"})," is just a starting point for me 😉."]}),"
",t(o.p,{children:[n(o.strong,{children:"I love music"}),". Choir, piano, violin, guitar, ukulele, I have tried and played all of them. I am also a fan of ",n(o.strong,{children:"Ghibli films"})," and their enchanting soundtracks. (Thank you so much Hayao Miyazaki and Joe Hisaishi 🙏🏻❤️). If you catch me lost in thought, I'm probably composing my own melodies or picturing some scenes that will go with the flow~. I also tried out music composition with my MIDI keyboards and various softwares like FL Studio 12, Adobe Audition, Garage Band, Logic Pro X; made ",n(o.a,{href:"https://youtube.com/@bbfishstudio8837",children:"quite a few pieces"})," over the years, and learnt not just music creation, but also audio and video graphic editings along the way as well!"]}),"
",t(o.p,{children:["While I'm not exactly a marathon enthusiast (running? Nah, not my piece of cake), I do love ",n(o.strong,{children:"swimming"}),", ",n(o.strong,{children:"cycling"})," and ",n(o.strong,{children:"roller blading"}),". There's something liberating about cruising through the city, soaking in the sights, and stumbling upon hidden gems along the way. It is a luxury nowadays to sometimes be able to just slow down and enjoy the little things in life 🌟. If I found little things or scenary that interests me, I will snap a photo or two with my phone and posted them on social media (so that they can help me save those memories in their databases haha)."]}),"
",t(o.p,{children:["I do some ",n(o.strong,{children:"readings"})," too, mainly Chinese books. From thought-provoking reads to interesting stories, my bookshelf (a digital one 👀) is slowly growing its size. Sometimes I will write down some notes and I do hope with this digital portfolio website finally up and running, I can share them with you guys in the future!"]}),"
",t(o.p,{children:["So, here you go! I revamped this portfolio website to bring you a glimpse of my little life, with code, learning, creativity and simply just enjoyments of life. Feel free to wander through my digital playground here and ",n(o.a,{href:"/contacts",children:"drop me a line"})," if you fancy a chat. Let's brew some magic together!"]}),"
",n(o.p,{children:"Catch you on the flip side,
Yuxuan 😉"}),"
",n(o.hr,{}),"
",n(o.p,{children:"哈喽！我是李雨轩。我生于四川，在厦门长大，从15岁起从中国来到新加坡，现在坡岛已经成为我的第二家园了哈哈。"}),"
",t(o.p,{children:["白天，我是一名",n(o.strong,{children:"软件工程师"}),"，专注于",n(o.strong,{children:"网页开发"}),"。目前我在 ",n(o.a,{href:"https://mobbin.com",children:"Mobbin"})," 工作，负责开发一个内部工具🤫。我对于创造美观且功能性的用户体验深感着迷，也不断地学习更多软件工程相关的课题！除了 ",n(o.a,{href:"https://liyuxuan.dev",children:"这个个人网站"})," 之外，我还抽出一些时间开发 ",n(o.a,{href:"https://taboo-ai.vercel.app",children:"Taboo AI"}),"。这是一个结合了人工智能的网页应用，旨在帮助英语学习者扩大词汇量和表达能力，拥有不断增长的话题和词汇库。作为一名软件工程师，我的梦想是有一天能够创造一系列的教育工具，帮助学习者以一种有趣且有效的方式学习！"]}),"
",t(o.p,{children:[n(o.strong,{children:"我热爱音乐"}),"。合唱团、钢琴、小提琴、吉他，这些我都有所尝试。我是一个",n(o.strong,{children:"吉卜力电影"}),"粉，超级喜欢吉卜力世界里的单纯美好，以及优美动人的电影配乐（非常感谢宫崎骏先生和久石让先生🙏🏻❤️）。我是个I人，如果有时候你看到我陷入沉思，我可能正在脑补一些梦幻的场景，或者可能正沉浸在某段旋律之中~。我也尝试过用 MIDI 键盘和软件进行音乐创作，这些年来积累创作了 ",n(o.a,{href:"https://youtube.com/@bbfishstudio8837",children:"不少作品"}),"，并在这个过程中学会了一些音乐创作技巧，以及音频和视频编辑的技术。"]}),"
",t(o.p,{children:["虽然我不是马拉松爱好者（跑步？不是我的菜），但我喜欢",n(o.strong,{children:"游泳"}),"、",n(o.strong,{children:"骑自行车"}),"和",n(o.strong,{children:"溜直排轮"}),"。在城市中穿行，享受风景，发现一些隐藏的美好，这种感觉真的很自由。现在，能够慢下来，享受生活中的小事，真的是一种奢侈🌟。如果我发现了一些有趣的事物或风景，我会用手机拍下一两张照片，然后分享到社交媒体上（这样它们就可以帮我保存在数据库里不然我可能会弄丢哈哈）。"]}),"
",n(o.p,{children:"我也会偶尔读一些书，主要是中文书。从发人深省的读物到有趣的故事，我的书架（电纸书👀）正在慢慢增长。有时候我会写一些读书笔记，希望有了这个个人网站，我可以在未来和你们分享一些这些读书笔记！"}),"
",t(o.p,{children:["所以，这就是我！我重新设计了这个个人网站，希望能够让你们看到我的一些生活，包括代码、学习、创造力和生活中的一些享受。随时欢迎你们在我的个人游乐场里闲逛，如果你想聊天，也欢迎 ",n(o.a,{href:"/contacts",children:"给我留言"}),"。让我们一起创造一些魔法吧🔮！"]}),"
",n(o.p,{children:"不见不散！
雨轩 😉"})]})}return{default:function(e={}){const{wrapper:t}=e.components||{};return t?n(t,{...e,children:n(_createMdxContent,{...e})}):_createMdxContent(e)}};

title: Playground
subtitle: Ideas的游乐场
body:
const{Fragment:e,jsx:n,jsxs:t}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(a){const i={h2:"h2",img:"img",p:"p",...a.components};return t(e,{children:[n(i.p,{children:"This is a place I have always wanted to put up in my personal website. I want it to be a free space where I can conduct all kinds of interesting experiments, being design and code related, for example, doing some cool CSS animations or pattern generations, or even some fun little JavaScript games. Or maybe a piece of video effects, or new ways of creating music? Or put up some interesting AI stuff. I want to make it a place where I can freely express my creativity and share it with the world. I hope you enjoy it as much as I do 😉"}),"
",n(i.p,{children:"这是我一直想在我的个人网站上放置的地方。我希望它是一个自由的空间，我可以在这里进行各种有趣的实验，包括设计和代码相关的，例如做一些酷炫的CSS动画或图案生成，甚至一些有趣的小JavaScript游戏。或者一些视频特效，或者创作音乐的新方式？或者放一些有趣的AI相关的小实验。我希望它是一个我可以自由表达我的创造力并与世界分享的地方。希望你和我一样喜欢它😉"}),"
",n(i.h2,{children:"Mini piano 小钢琴"}),"
",n("a",{href:"/experiments/piano",children:n(i.p,{children:n(i.img,{src:"https://tvstbbuidvwgelgidaqy.supabase.co/storage/v1/object/public/playgrounds/piano.png",alt:"piano
screenshot"})})}),"
",n("a",{href:"/experiments/piano",children:"Play the mini piano | 弹弹钢琴试试看？"})]})}return{default:function(e={}){const{wrapper:t}=e.components||{};return t?n(t,{...e,children:n(_createMdxContent,{...e})}):_createMdxContent(e)}};

title: Projects
subtitle: 小成果展示
body:
const{Fragment:e,jsx:t,jsxs:i}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(n){const a={code:"code",figcaption:"figcaption",figure:"figure",h2:"h2",h3:"h3",hr:"hr",img:"img",p:"p",pre:"pre",span:"span",strong:"strong",...n.components},{BadgeGroup:r,ExternalActionButtonLink:s}=a;return r||_missingMdxReference("BadgeGroup",!0),s||_missingMdxReference("ExternalActionButtonLink",!0),i(e,{children:[t(a.h2,{children:"Taboo AI"}),"
",t("a",{href:"https://taboo-ai.vercel.app",target:"_blank",children:t(a.p,{children:t(a.img,{src:"https://github.com/xmliszt/resources/blob/main/taboo-ai/images/v300/poster3.0(features).png?raw=true",alt:"Taboo AI"})})}),"
",t(a.p,{children:"Taboo AI offers English learners a gamified experience to practice English expressions and vocabulary, with feedbacks. The game is based on the popular board game Taboo, where players have to describe a word without using a list of forbidden words."}),"
",t(a.p,{children:"Taboo AI 提供给英语学习者一种游戏化的体验，帮助他们练习英语表达和词汇，并提供反馈。这款游戏是基于流行的桌游Game of Taboo开发的，玩家需要描述一个词，但不能使用一系列禁止使用的词汇，达到让AI猜出这个词是什么的目的。"}),"
",t(s,{href:"https://taboo-ai.vercel.app"}),"
",t(r,{tags:["typescript","nextjs","tailwindcss","supabase","postgres"]}),"
",t(a.hr,{}),"
",t(a.h2,{children:"Easy Next"}),"
",t("a",{href:"https://www.npmjs.com/package/easy-next",target:"_blank",children:t(a.p,{children:t(a.img,{src:"https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/portfolio-35dfd.appspot.com/o/v2%2FtAD6hG0KxDMM1OiiRmfhRgXyY1d2%2Fprojects%2Feasy-next-poster.png?alt=media&token=acd43a73-7806-4aab-8929-18935cda0127",alt:"Easy
Next"})})}),"
",t(a.p,{children:"Easy Next is a CLI template tool to create a new Next.js App Router Typescript project with a single command. It's a wrapper around the Next.js CLI, with a few extra features, like choosing a template, adding additional libraries and frameworks, setting up linters and formatters, and more."}),"
",t(a.p,{children:"Easy Next 是一个 CLI 模板工具，可通过单个命令创建新的 Next.js 应用程序路由 TypeScript 项目。它是 Next.js CLI 的封装，具有一些额外的功能，如选择模板、添加额外的库和框架、设置代码检查工具和格式工具等。"}),"
",i(a.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:[t(a.figcaption,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-title":"","data-language":"bash","data-theme":"vitesse-light vitesse-dark",children:"easy-next usage | easy-next使用方法"}),t(a.pre,{style:{"--shiki-light":"#393a34","--shiki-dark":"#dbd7caee","--shiki-light-bg":"#ffffff","--shiki-dark-bg":"#121212"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"bash","data-theme":"vitesse-light vitesse-dark",raw:"npx easy-next@latest
",children:t(a.code,{"data-language":"bash","data-theme":"vitesse-light vitesse-dark",style:{display:"grid"},children:i(a.span,{"data-line":"",children:[t(a.span,{style:{"--shiki-light":"#59873A","--shiki-dark":"#80A665"},children:"npx"}),t(a.span,{style:{"--shiki-light":"#B56959","--shiki-dark":"#C98A7D"},children:" easy-next@latest"})]})})})]}),"
",t(s,{href:"https://www.npmjs.com/package/easy-next"}),"
",t(r,{tags:["javascript","nodejs","npm"]}),"
",t(a.hr,{}),"
",t(a.h2,{children:"Costume Party"}),"
",t("a",{href:"https://costume-party.web.app/",target:"_blank",children:t(a.p,{children:t(a.img,{src:"https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/portfolio-35dfd.appspot.com/o/v2%2FtAD6hG0KxDMM1OiiRmfhRgXyY1d2%2Fprojects%2FArtboard%201.png?alt=media&token=75e3fece-c208-4ff2-824f-c088f1c285fe",alt:"Costume
Party"})})}),"
",t(a.p,{children:"Costume Party brings the fun of Costume Party Assassins board game to the web. It's a last-man-standing game where players have to guess other players' identities through their actions and movements across the rooms, and carry out assassinations to be the last one alive."}),"
",t(a.p,{children:"Costume Party 将《Costume Party Assassins》桌游的乐趣带到了网络中。这是一个生存至最后的游戏，玩家需要通过其他玩家在房间间的行动和移动来猜测其身份，并进行暗杀行动，以成为最后存活的人。"}),"
",t(s,{href:"https://costume-party.web.app/"}),"
",t(r,{tags:["typescript","vuejs","firebase"]}),"
",t(a.hr,{}),"
",t(a.h2,{children:"Unity games"}),"
",t(a.h3,{children:"CB2.0 (COVID-19 themed)"}),"
",t("iframe",{width:"560",height:"315",src:"https://www.youtube.com/embed/1vXQv4OH5wU?si=Gdg-p0VlOUUx-4sd",title:"YouTube video player",frameborder:"0",allow:"accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share",allowfullscreen:!0}),"
",i(a.p,{children:["A Unity group project I did with three other friends back in uni as the final project of our game development course. The game is a ",t(a.strong,{children:"COVID-19 themed"})," 2D platformer which supports up to 4 players. There are in total four mini-games for selection, each game is created with a different theme and mechanics, revolving around the concept of ",t(a.strong,{children:"swab test"}),", ",t(a.strong,{children:"social distancing"})," and ",t(a.strong,{children:"fighting for toilet paper"})," and ",t(a.strong,{children:"crowd control"}),". The game is designed to be played with friends, and it's a lot of fun to play together as a party game! Unfortunately, we haven't published the game on Steam yet, so you can visit our GitHub repository to download and build it yourself using Unity engine."]}),"
",i(a.p,{children:["一个我在大学时和另外三个朋友一起做的Unity小组项目，作为我们游戏开发课程的期末项目。这个游戏是一个",t(a.strong,{children:"COVID-19主题"}),"的2D平台游戏，支持最多4个玩家。总共有四个小游戏可供选择，每个游戏都有不同的主题和机制，围绕",t(a.strong,{children:"核酸检查"}),"、",t(a.strong,{children:"社交距离"}),"、",t(a.strong,{children:"争夺厕纸"}),"和",t(a.strong,{children:"人群控制"}),"等概念。作为一个派对游戏，和朋友们一起玩的时候非常有趣！不幸的是，我们还没有在Steam上发布这个游戏，所以你可以访问我们的GitHub，自己下载并使用Unity引擎构建。"]}),"
",t(s,{href:"https://github.com/xmliszt/CB2.0",title:"Download the game | 点这里下载"}),"
",t(r,{tags:["c#","unity"]}),"
",t(a.h3,{children:"Mario recreated"}),"
",t("a",{href:"https://xmliszt.itch.io/mario-final",target:"_blank",children:t(a.p,{children:t(a.img,{src:"https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/portfolio-35dfd.appspot.com/o/v2%2FtAD6hG0KxDMM1OiiRmfhRgXyY1d2%2Fprojects%2FMario%20Final.png?alt=media&token=d38ee634-050a-4831-a5fa-7f34d7596e50",alt:"Mario
recreated"})})}),"
",t(a.p,{children:"A Unity project back in uni, where I recreated the levels of the original Mario game, with increased difficulties and new mechanics. For example, Mario have a inventory system to store up to 4 power-ups."}),"
",t(a.p,{children:"一个我在大学里做的Unity项目，我在其中重新制作了原始马里奥游戏的关卡，增加了难度和新的机制。例如，马里奥有一个道具系统，可以存储高达4个强化道具并依次使用。"}),"
",t(s,{href:"https://xmliszt.itch.io/mario-final"}),"
",t(r,{tags:["c#","unity"]}),"
",t(a.h3,{children:"Mario infinity"}),"
",t("a",{href:"https://xmliszt.itch.io/mario-infinity",target:"_blank",children:t(a.p,{children:t(a.img,{src:"https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzYwMTc3ODEuanBn/347x500/y9h8UQ.jpg",alt:"Mario
infinity"})})}),"
",i(a.p,{children:["Another Unity project done back in school time. I experimented with ",t(a.strong,{children:"procedual asset generation"})," to create the backgrounds, platforms, enemies and consumables in this game. The game is endless, and the difficulty increases as the player progresses because there will be a firewall catching up from the left 🔥."]}),"
",i(a.p,{children:["另一个我在学校时做的Unity项目。我在这个游戏中尝试了",t(a.strong,{children:"过程化资源生成"}),"，用来创建背景、平台、敌人和可消耗品。游戏是无尽的，随着玩家的进步，难度会增加，因为会有一个防火墙从左边追赶🔥。"]}),"
",t(s,{href:"https://xmliszt.itch.io/mario-infinity"}),"
",t(r,{tags:["c#","unity"]}),"
",t(a.h3,{children:"Mario defense"}),"
",t("a",{href:"https://xmliszt.itch.io/mario-defense",target:"_blank",children:t(a.p,{children:t(a.img,{src:"https://img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMTA2MTQyOS82MDc2NDI3LmpwZw==/347x500/1SRIe9.jpg",alt:"Mario
defense"})})}),"
",i(a.p,{children:["Yet another Mario game haha. This time, I tried a little bit of physics, by implementing an ",t(a.strong,{children:"Angry Bird"})," inspired slingshot tower defense game. The player has to defend the castle from the incoming enemies by ",t(a.strong,{children:"shooting Mario"})," at them 😂 using a ",t(a.strong,{children:"slingshot"}),". Took me a while to get the slingshot mechanism working, loaded with elastic spring and calculate the impact from Mario's velocity. The game has three levels with increased difficulties. I can't pass the last one 🥵."]}),"
",i(a.p,{children:["又是一个马里奥游戏哈哈。这次，我尝试了一点物理，做一个",t(a.strong,{children:"愤怒的小鸟"}),"风格的弹弓塔防游戏。玩家需要通过使用一个",t(a.strong,{children:"弹弓"}),"来",t(a.strong,{children:"弹射马里奥"}),"以防御即将到来的敌人😂。花了我一段时间才让弹弓机制正常工作，装载了弹性弹簧并计算了马里奥速度的影响。游戏有三个难度递增的关卡。我至今无法通关🥵。"]}),"
",t(s,{href:"https://xmliszt.itch.io/mario-defense"}),"
",t(r,{tags:["c#","unity"]})]})}return{default:function(e={}){const{wrapper:i}=e.components||{};return i?t(i,{...e,children:t(_createMdxContent,{...e})}):_createMdxContent(e)}};function _missingMdxReference(e,t){throw new Error("Expected "+(t?"component":"object")+" `"+e+"` to be defined: you likely forgot to import, pass, or provide it.")}

title: Hobbies
subtitle: 兴趣爱好
body:
const{Fragment:e,jsx:r,jsxs:n}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(i){const o={a:"a",h2:"h2",h3:"h3",li:"li",p:"p",strong:"strong",ul:"ul",...i.components},{PhotoBentoGrid:l}=o;return l||function(e,r){throw new Error("Expected "+(r?"component":"object")+" `"+e+"` to be defined: you likely forgot to import, pass, or provide it.")}("PhotoBentoGrid",!0),n(e,{children:[n(o.p,{children:["In my spare time, I immerse myself in a diverse array of hobbies that reflect my multifaceted interests and passions. I find solace in the imaginative realms crafted by ",r(o.strong,{children:"Studio Ghibli"}),", where each ",r(o.strong,{children:"film"})," offers a captivating escape into worlds brimming with dreams, love, and kindness. ",r(o.strong,{children:"Music"})," is not just a pastime but a deeply ingrained part of my life — I've honed my skills across various instruments, from piano and violin to guitar and beyond, allowing me to ",r(o.strong,{children:"compose"})," my own melodies and produce music that speaks to the heart. ",r(o.strong,{children:"Photography"})," serves as my visual storytelling medium, capturing fleeting moments and encapsulating the beauty found in the world around me. These hobbies not only provide me with endless joy and inspiration but also shape my perspective and enrich my life in countless ways."]}),"
",n(o.p,{children:["在我的空闲时间里，我有多方面的兴趣爱好。我在由",r(o.strong,{children:"吉卜力"}),"工作室打造的想象领域中找到了慰藉，在每一部",r(o.strong,{children:"电影"}),"中，我都能沉浸在充满梦想、爱和善良的世界中。",r(o.strong,{children:"音乐"}),"不仅仅是一种消遣，而是我生活中深深扎根的一部分——我在钢琴、小提琴和吉他等各种乐器上磨练自己的技能，让我能够",r(o.strong,{children:"创作出自己的旋律"}),"，制作出触动心灵的音乐。",r(o.strong,{children:"摄影"}),"是我视觉叙事的媒介，捕捉着流逝的时刻，封存着我周围世界的美丽。这些爱好不仅为我带来无尽的快乐和灵感，而且在无数方面塑造了我的观点，丰富了我的生活。"]}),"
